observation_entries.next_best_action: Keep routine steady and pinch tips to encourage fuller growth.
observation_entries.condition_summary: This looks like mint, and it’s lively — dense growth, rich color, and no obvious stress.
observations: Leaves appear evenly green with no spotting
Growth looks dense and compact rather than leggy
Soil appears evenly moist, not soggy
New growth is visible at multiple nodes
observation_entries.internal_checklist_notes: Outdoor potted herb with vigorous, healthy growth. Light appears adequate. No visible pest damage. Moisture looks balanced. No invasive flag within pot, but mint can spread aggressively if planted in-ground.
recommended_actions: Keep doing what you’re doing: water when the top layer starts to dry
Pinch tips occasionally to encourage bushier growth
observation_entries.user_note: This one makes me happy. It smells amazing.
